Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,368,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/5/1985, off Bobby Thigpen (CHC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1986, hitting .467 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Pittsburgh on 9/2/1986...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Pittsburgh on 9/2/1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 7/15/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/30/1989 with a Broken Foot, out for 4-5 weeks...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
Hit for the cycle against San Diego on 4/15/1990...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
10/27/1990: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $1,810,000 per year, for 2 years.
